summary.span: 作为所有 ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体页面的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET mobile Web Forms pages.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类从 ASP.NET 类继承。The class inherits from the ASP.NET class. 若要指定移动页并使用 ASP.NET 移动控件，ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体页必须包含以下 page 指令。To specify a mobile page and use ASP.NET mobile controls, an ASP.NET mobile Web Forms page must contain the following page directive. ``` <%@ Page Inherits="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage" Language="c#" %> ``` 需要 `Inherits` 属性。The `Inherits` attribute is required. `Language`如果需要，属性将设置为页面上所使用的语言。The `Language` attribute is set to the language that is used on the page, if it is needed. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 移动页允许每个页面上有多个移动窗体，而 ASP.NET 网页只允许在每页一种窗体上。ASP.NET mobile pages allow for multiple mobile forms on each page, whereas ASP.NET Web pages allow for only one form per page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初呈现某个页面时，页面中的第一个窗体将自动变为活动状态。When a page is initially rendered, the first form in the page is automatically made active. 在后续回发中，可以通过以编程方式设置此属性或通过控件的用户导航来使另一个窗体处于活动状态 。On subsequent postbacks, another form might be made active, either by programmatically setting this property, or as a result of user navigation through a control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用控件的 属性 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 如果当前移动设备允许控件的访问键，则该按钮将显示提交窗体的访问密钥。If the current mobile device allows for access keys for controls, the button will display the access key that submits the form. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了 接口外，ASP.NET 页框架还提供了一个 `CustomAttributes` 字典，该字典允许您指定其他特性、启用或禁用自定义特性化或调整控件的行为或呈现。In addition to the interface, the ASP.NET page framework provides a `CustomAttributes` dictionary that allows you to specify additional attributes, enable or disable custom attributing, or adjust a control's behavior or rendering. 若要启用或禁用自定义特性设置，可以将 属性设置为 `true` ，也可以将 `allowCustomAttributes` Web.config 的节的特性设置 `` 为 `true` 。To enable or disable custom attributing, you can either set the property to `true`, or you can set the `allowCustomAttributes` attribute of the `` section of Web.config to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 启用自定义属性后，属性名称中的版式错误可解释为自定义属性。When custom attributes are enabled, typographic errors in property names can be interpreted as custom attributes. 例如，如果开发人员错误地将 控件的属性指定为 "Txet"，则分析器会将其另存为一个名为 "Txet" 的自定义特性，而不是引发异常。For example, if a developer incorrectly specifies the property of a control as "Txet", the parser would save it as a custom attribute called "Txet" instead of raising an exception. 出于此原因，自定义属性默认情况下处于禁用状态。For this reason, custom attributes are disabled by default. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来启用上的自定义 `AccessKey` 特性 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the custom `AccessKey` attribute on the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并且如果将其直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if you copy it directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。You must copy this code sample into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 控件创建用于在服务器上引发回发事件的客户端脚本。ASP.NET controls create client-side scripts to raise postback events on the server. 恶意用户可以使用回发脚本向服务器控件发送任意 post 事件。It is possible for a malicious user to use the postback script to send arbitrary post events to server controls. 出于此原因，ASP.NET 版本2.0 控件验证事件数据，以确保事件是由控件呈现的客户端代码引发的。For this reason, ASP.NET version 2.0 controls validate the event data to ensure that the event was raised by client-side code rendered by the control. 移动页不支持事件验证。Event validation is not supported in mobile pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 此成员重写 方法，并将所有现有适配器状态与视图状态一起保存到对象数组中。This member overrides the method and saves any existing adapter state with the view state in an object array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望从视图状态还原页面，并且页面的基础会话已过期，则此方法的默认实现会引发异常。If you expect to restore a page from a view state, and the page's underlying session has expired, this method's default implementation raises an exception. 您可以重写此方法，执行自定义处理以还原页状态，而无需依赖于视图状态，而不会调用基实现即可返回。You can override this method, perform custom handling to restore the page state without relying on view state, and return without calling the base implementation.

span.span: The query string that accompanied the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回请求中的任何字符，这些字符遵循 URL 中的问号 (？ ) 。The property returns any characters in the request that follow the question mark (?) in the URL. 此值可以与 属性不同。This value can be different from the property. 对于为回发插入 URL 中的唯一文件路径后缀的设备，此属性会自动去掉文件路径后缀。For devices where a unique file path suffix is inserted into a URL for postback, this property automatically strips out the file path suffix. 例如，如果原始查询为 "/home.aspx？ id = john + doe"，则属性的值 将为 "id = john + doe"。For example, if the original query is "/home.aspx?id=john+doe", the value of the property will be "id=john+doe". 以下回发 URL 可以是 "/home.aspx？ _ufps = 20292303920&id = john + doe"。A following postback URL could be "/home.aspx?_ufps=20292303920&id=john+doe". 在最后一次回发时，属性的值 将再次为 "id = john + doe"，因为将去除唯一后缀。On this last postback, the value of the property will again be "id=john+doe", because the unique suffix will be stripped out. > [!CAUTION] > 如果存储在属性中的键/值对的键部分与该 对象上的控件的属性相同，则将 从属性中移除视图状态和键/值对 。If the key portion of the key/value pair stored in the property is the same as the property of a control on the object, the view state and the key/value pair are removed from the property.
